data.prayer: the county of Valsad has (about) 18,763 people who know Jesus, 20,696 people who know about him culturally, and 1,666,242 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Valsad, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Valsad, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Valsad, Gujarat, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Valsad.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Sathwara people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Sathwara people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Sathwara people is yours.
Spirit, make the church in Valsad, Gujarat, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Valsad, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Valsad are far from Jesus.

location.name: Valsad
location.people_groups_list: Vaghri (Muslim traditions), Gadhai, Khalpa, Alkari, Nadia
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Vaghri (Muslim traditions) (22,000), Gadhai (100), Khalpa (118,000), Alkari (500), Nadia (54,000)
